languages.text: "Я хотел{mf||а} бы заменить картину с покойной Теодорой в моих покоях. Повесьте туда мой портрет".

traits.locale_text: "Я хотел{mf||а} бы заменить картину с покойной Теодорой в моих покоях. Повесьте туда мой портрет".

languages.text: "I would like to replace the painting of the late Theodora in my chambers. Hang my portrait instead."
languages.original_text: "Я хотел{mf||а} бы заменить картину с покойной Теодорой в моих покоях. Повесьте туда мой портрет".

traits.locale_text: "I would like {mf||a} to replace the painting of the late Theodora in my chambers. Hang my portrait instead."
"I would like to replace the painting of the late Theodora in my chambers. Hang my portrait instead."
"I would like to replace the painting of the late Theodora in my chambers. Hang my portrait instead."
"I would like to replace the painting of the late Theodora in my chambers. Hang my portrait instead."
"I would like to replace the painting of the late Theodora in my chambers. Hang my portrait instead."

languages.text: "Ich möchte das Gemälde der verstorbenen Theodora in meinen Gemächern ersetzen. Hängt stattdessen mein Porträt auf."
languages.original_text: "I would like to replace the painting of the late Theodora in my chambers. Hang my portrait instead."

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte das Gemälde der verstorbenen Theodora in meinen Gemächern ersetzen. Hängt stattdessen mein Porträt auf."

languages.text: « Je souhaite remplacer le portrait de la défunte Théodora dans mes appartements. Accrochez-y plutôt le mien. »
languages.original_text: "I would like to replace the painting of the late Theodora in my chambers. Hang my portrait instead."

traits.locale_text: « Je souhaite remplacer le portrait de la défunte Théodora dans mes appartements. Accrochez-y plutôt le mien. »

languages.text: “我打算把已故的西奥多拉的画像换掉，在我的卧室里换上我自己的肖像。”
languages.original_text: "I would like to replace the painting of the late Theodora in my chambers. Hang my portrait instead."

traits.locale_text: “我打算把已故的西奥多拉的画像换掉，在我的卧室里换上我自己的肖像。”

languages.text: 「部屋にあるシオドーラの絵画を取り替えたい。代わりに私の肖像画を掛けてくれ」
languages.original_text: "I would like to replace the painting of the late Theodora in my chambers. Hang my portrait instead."

traits.locale_text: 「部屋にある故シオドーラの絵画を取り替えたい。代わりに私の肖像画を掛けてくれ」

languages.text: «Me gustaría reemplazar el cuadro de la difunta Theodora de mis aposentos. Cámbielo por un retrato mío».
languages.original_text: "I would like to replace the painting of the late Theodora in my chambers. Hang my portrait instead."

traits.locale_text: «Me gustaría reemplazar el cuadro de la difunta Theodora de mis aposentos. Cámbielo por un retrato mío».

languages.text: "Merhum Theodora'nın odamdaki tablosunu değiştirmek istiyorum. Yerine benim portremi asın."
languages.original_text: "I would like to replace the painting of the late Theodora in my chambers. Hang my portrait instead."

traits.locale_text: "Merhum Theodora'nın odamdaki tablosunu değiştirmek istiyorum. Yerine benim portremi asın."
